Subjective: Sore throat for 3 days; fever this morning; cough last week; painful swallowing; concern about abscess; request for antibiotics; impact on daily life: unable to play tennis due to fatigue; no smoking/alcohol.
Objective: Vitals: temperature 38.3Â°C; Physical Exam: ears - right ear canal redness; throat - slightly enlarged tonsils, slightly red pharyngeal arch; lungs - vesicular breath sounds; saturation - 98%; no signs of abscess or pathological lymph nodes.
Assessment: Viral pharyngitis; no signs of abscess or bacterial infection.
Plan: Continue taking paracetamol 4 times a day and ibuprofen 3 times a day as needed for pain

Wait it out; antibiotics not necessary
Contact us again if symptoms worsen, shortness of breath, or difficulty swallowing
